txt.en: Goblin-spies creep along the edges of the fighting during the Dagor Carlanthir.
'Oh!'
Goblin-spies creep along the edges of the fighting during the Dagor Carlanthir.
Overwhelmed by the sight of such evil, Balakhâd flees from the battle.
You caught sight of Balakhâd fighting a goblin-spy to the south during the Dagor Carlanthir.
Khôltekh is on the eastern bank of the river during the Dagor Carlanthir.

'When Sigileth the Elf came to the oasis to speak with the Kintai, I listened to the message she brought. She spoke of the great evil waking in these canyons, but I did not expect...'

Balakhâd's eyes are wide as he stares about himself at the boiling mass of Orcs.

'I wanted to see it for myself... but no longer! No longer!'
You have found Balakhâd on the edge of the fighting during the Dagor Carlanthir.
Defeat goblin-spies during the Dagor Carlanthir ([placeholder]/5)

'You have slain some of the goblin-spies? Good. Attacking an enemy's sources of knowledge may at times be more effective than wounding them directly.\n\n'Knowledge is power, [placeholder]. Never forget that!'
Defeated goblin-spies during the Dagor Carlanthir ([placeholder]/5)
Defeat goblin-spies during the Dagor Carlanthir (4/5)
Find Balakhâd south of Mithrandir's position during the Dagor Carlanthir
Talk to Balakhâd to the south of Mithrandir's position during the Dagor Carlanthir
You catch sight of Balakhâd engaged in combat with a goblin-spy far to the south
Wait for Balakhâd to escape
Talk to Khôltekh during the Dagor Carlanthir
Despite his injuries, Balakhâd survived his fight with a goblin-spy
Khôltekh fights for Umbar during the Dagor Carlanthir.

'You have heard that knowledge is power? It is true: battles are won by the side that obtains the most intelligence.\n\n'Hunt the goblin-spies that scamper throughout the battlefield, [placeholder]. They should pose little danger to you, but while they live they can deliver messages to their masters. We must stop the delivery of these messages if we wish to attain the upper hand in this battle.'

'Hunt the goblin-spies that scamper throughout the battlefield, [placeholder]. They should pose little danger to you, but while they live they can deliver messages to their masters. We must stop the delivery of these messages if we wish to attain the upper hand in this battle.'
Desperate Battle: Khôltekh of the Shoreward Stone

'Hunt the goblin-spies that scamper throughout the battlefield, [placeholder]. They should pose little danger to you, but while they live they can deliver messages to their masters. We must stop the delivery of these messages if we wish to attain the upper hand in this battle.'
